Reviews.Title: Video aspect seems fine, audio not so much
Reviews.Author: Scott Smith
Reviews.Content: We replaced our audio only monitor with this monitor recently.  To ensure we could see the entire crib, we had to mount it on the wall about 3-4 feet above on an angle down.  Should be plenty close to have good audio reception (these should pick up anything in the room in my opinion).  Unfortunately, we can barely hear unless our baby is actually crying.  Rustling and slight noises are almost non-existent and crying is still so quiet it we can sometimes not even notice.  Our audio monitor picked up sound and transmitted it at a much higher volume.  It sucks, because this was a good price and had good reviews so we were really hopeful it would work well for us.  Will be returning shortly.

Reviews.Title: finally a great monitor
Reviews.Author: hopefullyitsgood
Reviews.Content: This is our fourth baby, so you can imagine we have gone through a few monitors. But none like this one. This is great.Works exactly the way it says it will. Good picture, great price! So happy!

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: cara
Reviews.Content: Well worth the money.  Better than expected.  I recommend this for anyone needing a video monitor.  Bonus plays lullabys and has night vision.

Reviews.Title: Good monitor
Reviews.Author: Ryan Richardson
Reviews.Content: A good monitor for the price.  I would recommend this to a friend.  I wish the color was better. It works.

Reviews.Title: Took a risk, glad I did!
Reviews.Author: Harmony Cornett
Reviews.Content: When I ordered this, there were no reviews!  I took a risk and it turned out to be great!  The battery lasts about 5 solid hours, which is fine because I just plug it in where ever I am.  It comes with night vision, lullaby's and an sd card so you can record what's on the screen.  The only thing is that I wanted a monitor that I could move, to the right or left, as the baby moves.  But I have to go in and adjust it myself.  It is fine though because I raised it high enough in the room that it captures the whole room!  Wonderful product!

Reviews.Title: Good for the price I paid for it
Reviews.Author: jilly
Reviews.Content: I bought this monitor when it was $64.99, and now the price has increased to $179.99.  I definitely think it is well worth what I paid, but I wouldn't pay the new price.  The picture is good.  I have the monitor mounted to the wall and I can see the entire crib.  I can't tell if baby has her eyes closed or not bc it doesn't zoom, but I can see if she's still or thrashing about.  I don't pick up any sound on it though so I have my sound monitor in there as well. The night vision is good as well.  I would recommend it for the price I paid, but not for over $100.

Reviews.Title: Works as promised, no problems so far. Records to SD card!
Reviews.Author: GeorgiaGeekGuy
Reviews.Content: One of the few that can RECORD (and to a regular SD card!)The range seems fine (camera downstairs, viewer upstairs, no problems). No interference with my cordless phones or wi-fi router.I wish it had motion detection auto-recording (I knew it didn't when I bought it), but it can be set to record when it hears a loud enough sound. I think there are 2 sound levels you can choose from. On either setting, the sound has to be sorta loud, such as (duh) a baby crying) for it to start auto-recording.I got this here on Amazon for under 70 bucks. It is definitely worth that, but I wouldn't pay over 99 dollars for it. There are also standalone First Alert cameras available that work with this monitor, should you need a second one or to replace the original one.Overall am pleased, and hope it lasts a couple years or more.

Reviews.Title: Bad experience
Reviews.Author: FabMA
Reviews.Content: I recently recieved the package however it contained an add on camera instead of the monitor/camera set I bought. I expect them to send me the correct item. i am really disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Amy Lin
Reviews.Content: Very reliable, easy set up instructions, overall a great value! The only thing I wish was different is the mounting for the camera. We just strapped it to one of the bars of the crib with zip ties. Would be nicer if it had an adjustable camera, but the quality of the camera itself is really good!

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: Kyle Bundy
Reviews.Content: It does everything it says it will. Very easy to use. The night vision works great and you are easily able to hear your baby.

Reviews.Title: Very Good Monitor
Reviews.Author: Natasha Lee
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my sister for her baby shower and she absolutely loves it. she said its very clear and the picture is good.
